title: For Afghan evacuees arriving to U.S., a tenuous legal status and little financial support
content:
1. For Afghan evacuees arriving to U.S., a tenuous legal status and little financial support  The Washington Post
  2. EU countries divided on stance over Afghan refugees | English News | World | WION  WION
  3. As some countries welcome Afghan refugees, others are trying to keep them out  The Washington Post
  4. EU's hard Afghan slog may perish due to 'Fortress Europe'  EUobserver
  5. Opinion | Afghan refugees will know indifference, bigotry — and also kindness — in America. They will also make it better.  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 米国に到着したアフガン人避難民にとって、不安定な法的地位と少ない経済的支援
对于抵达美国的阿富汗撤离人员来说，他们的法律地位很脆弱，几乎没有经济支持。
對於抵達美國的阿富汗撤離人員來說，他們的法律地位很脆弱，幾乎沒有經濟支持。
